messages.subject: Toba-Fushimi depiction
messages.msgSnippet: Ran across this today and am now completely confused. I am guessing this is a modern depiction of the battle? But why do they 1) have the Shinsengumi armed
messages.messageBody:
Ran across this today and am now completely confused. I am guessing
this is a modern depiction of the battle? But why do they 1) have the
Shinsengumi armed with rifles? and 2) Put the makoto symbol on the
back of their haori?

Perhaps the symbol is just meant to identify them? But I am just not
understanding about the guns...

-MissB
